head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBINSON, HORACE BROOKES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBINSON, HORACE BROOKES

block.p: ROBINSON - Horace Brookes Blackwell. On October 3rd, peacefully at home. Beloved husband of Henrietta T. Father of Edward T., Thomas D. and J. Howland. Grandfather of Lloyd and Elizabeth, William & Emily, Samuel and Evelyn. Memorial service on Friday, October 20, 11AM, at the Brick Presbyterian Church, Park Avenue and 91st Street. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Brick Church, 62 East 92nd Street, NY, NY 10128, or to the Youth Foundation, 36 West 44th Street, New York, NY 10036.
